text: Don't Say No may refer to: * Don't Say No (Billy Squier album), a 1981 album by American rock singer Billy Squier, and its title track * Don't Say No (Seohyun EP), a 2016 extended play by South Korean pop singer Seohyun, and its title track * "Don't Say No" (Tom Tom Club song), from the 1988 album Boom Boom Chi Boom Boom ==See also== * "Don't Say No Tonight", a 1985 single by Eugene Wilde
title: Don't Say No
